channel.title: (PI) LL Client Run ERROR (MustSee)
channel.description:
Hello guys, I ran into a weird problem with eclipse. I have a server i'm working on (PI) My computer has Windows and Mac, I can run it perfectly fine using Windows and it works fine! However, the client doesn't run on Mac?? The cache and everything is fine, trust me. The cache downloads automatically and extracts perfectly... Users.home The weird weird thing is that the Client actually works till it's 89% loaded. /: [b]Here's a picture[/b] and here's the error eclipse is giving me when i'm trying to run the client. everything but the Client is fine.
[b]Error:[/b] [CODE] Map Amount: 1226 Started repacking index 4. Finished repacking 4. 508 Object Amount: 38424 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class29.method326(Class29.java:19) at Class29.method325(Class29.java:13) at Class6.method169(Class6.java:234) at Sounds.method242(Sounds.java:49) at Sounds.unpack(Sounds.java:23) at client.startUp(client.java:10625) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:85) at client.run(client.java:7126) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:695) [/CODE] ANY AND EVERY HELP IS GREATLY Appreciated! THANKS!

item.title: (PI) LL Client Run ERROR (MustSee)
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Hello guys,
I ran into a weird problem with eclipse.
I have a server i’m working on (PI) My computer has Windows and Mac, I can run it perfectly fine using Windows and it works fine! However, the client doesn’t run on Mac??
The cache and everything is fine, trust me.
The cache downloads automatically and extracts perfectly… Users.home
The weird weird thing is that the Client actually works till it’s 89% loaded. /:
Here’s a picture and here’s the error eclipse is giving me when i’m trying to run the client.
everything but the Client is fine.

Error:

Map Amount: 1226 Started repacking index 4. Finished repacking 4. 508 Object Amount: 38424 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class29.method326(Class29.java:19) at Class29.method325(Class29.java:13) at Class6.method169(Class6.java:234) at Sounds.method242(Sounds.java:49) at Sounds.unpack(Sounds.java:23) at client.startUp(client.java:10625) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:85) at client.run(client.java:7126) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:695)
ANY AND EVERY HELP IS GREATLY Appreciated! THANKS!

Read full topic
